data.title: Dining at Residence Inn Orlando at FLAMINGO CROSSINGS Town Center
data.meta_description: Dining options at Residence Inn Orlando at FLAMINGO CROSSINGS Town Center include a poolside bar, free breakfast with Mickey Mouse waffles and more.
data.text:
Featherstones Poolside Bar & Grill

American

Casual fare meets poolside bliss at Featherstone's. From frozen drinks and savory bites to an open-air ambiance, Featherstone's offers the perfect retreat under the sun.

Everyday

12:00 PM-5:00 PM

Dress Code: Casual

Complimentary Breakfast Buffet

American

Start your day off right with plenty of energy at our free hot breakfast buffet, filled with traditional breakfast favorites like scrambled eggs and bacon.

Everyday

6:30 AM-10:00 AM

24/7 Market

Other

When cravings hit or youâ€™re short on time, early risers and late adventurers can find ready-to-go options including salads, drinks, and light snacks at our 24-hour market.
